SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_ue_company (full_name, auth_status, short_name, admin_name, contact_way, region_info, reg_address, create_dt, reg_capital, business_scope, comp_intro, reg_dt, remark, industry, create_user_id ) values (#{fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{shortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regionInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{regCapital,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessScope,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{compIntro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{industry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.update: update t_ue_company set full_name = #{fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, auth_status = #{authStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, short_name = #{shortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, admin_name = #{adminName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact_way = #{contactWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, region_info = #{regionInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reg_address = #{regAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_dt = #{createDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, reg_capital = #{regCapital,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, business_scope = #{businessScope,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comp_intro = #{compIntro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reg_dt = #{regDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, industry = #{industry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where comp_id = #{compId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select comp_id, full_name, auth_status, short_name, admin_name, contact_way, region_info, reg_address, create_dt, reg_capital, business_scope, comp_intro, reg_dt, remark, industry, create_user_id from t_ue_company where comp_id = #{compId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select comp_id, full_name, auth_status, short_name, admin_name, contact_way, region_info, reg_address, create_dt, reg_capital, business_scope, comp_intro, reg_dt, remark, industry, create_user_id from t_ue_company

select comp_id, full_name, auth_status, short_name, admin_name, contact_way, region_info, reg_address, create_dt, reg_capital, business_scope, comp_intro, reg_dt, remark, industry, create_user_id from t_ue_company WHERE create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
